name: divcli

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cc), wne(c1, nat0))

body.origin:
|- wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cc)
-| wne(c1, nat0)
-| wi(wne(c1, nat0), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cc))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cc)
-| wne(c1, nat0)
-| wi(wne(c1, nat0), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cc))

body.origin:
|- wi(wne(c1, nat0), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cc))
-| wcel(c0, cc)
-| wcel(c1, cc)

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cc)
-| wne(c1, nat0)
-| wcel(c0, cc)
-| wcel(c1, cc)

comment: Closure law for division. (Contributed by NM, 2-Feb-1995.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-Feb-2014.)
